metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34484 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The Mozilla Fuzzing Team reported potential vulnerabilities present inThunderbird 91.10. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruptionand we presume that with enough effort some of these could have beenexploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 102,Firefox ESR < 91.11, Thunderbird < 102, and Thunderbird < 91.11.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
